Texts.Chs: 我不敢相信这不是香蕉！
Texts.Eng: I Can't Believe It's Not Banana!

Texts.Chs: 在#398味觉测试中，进行的是查看是否可以区分真的香蕉与‘我不敢相信它不是香蕉！’的味道。测试者坦白自己的确分不出。
Texts.Eng: In taste test #398, the subject was unable to distinguish between the taste of real banana (for a value of real, anyway) and that of 'I can't believe it's not banana!' banana-flavoured substitute. In fact, when presented with evidence to the contrary, she flatly refused to believe it.

Texts.Chs: 很快，所有猿人消费的香蕉中有70%可能会被替换成“我不敢相信这不是香蕉！”，来自珊瑚果的浆糊能降低成本和给配给程序减压。
Texts.Eng: Soon, it may be possible to replace up to 70% of bananas consumed by all Apex with 'I can't believe it's not banana!' coralcreep-derived paste, lowering costs and easing rationing procedures.

Texts.Chs: 这标志着一个巨大的成功，因为受试者是三次烹饪游戏节目“大猿的厨房”的冠军,。根据我们最新的公式，只有不到0.1%的受试者能够辨别出替代品。
Texts.Eng: This marks a sounding success as the subject was a three-time winner of the cooking game show, 'Big Ape's Kitchen'. As of our latest formulation, less than 0.1% of subjects were able to discern the substitute.
